comments.author: @cinqtonic
comments.text:
WOW! You have to hold the power button for about 6 seconds (so you hear 2 beeps. The first one is for rest mode, the second one turns it off). Also when you're playing ps4 just hold the PS button on your controller for a few seconds and then go on power options > turn off ps4... 


Hope this helped you lol
